attributes.comment:
1. Would love to see physician stratified by race. People are searching for this anyway due to the need for representation and wanting to go to a provider who looks like them.

Also due to the data now showing better outcomes for those who have a provider that looks like themselves.

2. Also information on hospital providing nurse staffing ratios. We know that quality of care outcomes are related to staffing capacity.
